meanings.definition: A mixture of oxygen and acetylene used in welding and cutting metals.
meanings.sent1: The welder ignited the oxyacetylene to join the metal pieces together.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic relied on oxyacetylene for precise metal cutting.
meanings.sent3: The oxyacetylene hissed softly as it worked its magic on the steel beam.
meanings.sent4: The oxyacetylene torch danced like a fiery artist on the metal canvas.
meanings.sent5: The bright flame of oxyacetylene illuminated the dark workshop.
